namespace.name: spring
namespace.usage-description: Tags for generating a bean-wiring file for the Spring framework.

parameter.name: autowire
parameter.usage-description: Set's the autowiring mode for the bean. "byName" wires beans to properties by matching the bean's name to the property name. "byType" wires beans to properties by matching a bean's type to the property type. "constructor" wires beans through a constructor's parameters by matching types. "auto-detect" allows Spring to choose between "byType" and "constructor" as it sees fit. "no" indicates that no auto-wiring should be performed on this bean.

parameter.name: dependency-check
parameter.usage-description: Sets dependency checking rules on a bean. "none" indicates no dependency checking. "simple" dependency checking includes primitives and String. "objects" dependency checking includes collaborators (other beans). "all" performs both "simple" and "objects" dependency checking.

parameter.name: destroy-method
parameter.usage-description: The name of an method to be invoked on bean factory shutdown.

parameter.name: init-method
parameter.usage-description: The name of an initialization method to be invoked upon bean instantiation.

parameter.name: lazy-init
parameter.usage-description: If "true", Spring will instantiate this bean when it's needed, rather than at bean factory startup.

parameter.name: singleton
parameter.usage-description: If "true", one shared instance of this bean will be returned with every call to getBean(). If "false" each call results in a new instance.

tag.name: spring.property
tag.usage-description: Defines a property which may be defined in a superclass, but not in this particular bean class.

parameter.name: ref
parameter.usage-description: The id of another bean to wire to the property.

parameter.name: list
parameter.usage-description: Comma-separated list of values to assign as a List to a property of type java.util.List.

parameter.name: name
parameter.usage-description: The name of the property to be wired.

parameter.name: value
parameter.usage-description: The value to assign to the property.

parameter.name: ref
parameter.usage-description: The id of another bean to wire to the constructor argument.

parameter.name: list
parameter.usage-description: Comma-separated list of values to assign as a List to a constructor argument of type java.util.List.

parameter.name: value
parameter.usage-description: The value to assign to the constructor argument.
